SYNOPSIS: With a blend of science fiction and noir detective fiction, this dystopian film presents a vision of the future where man has developed the technology to create replicants, human-like androids with short life spans built by the Tyrell Corporation for use in dangerous off-world colonization. Deckard is a Blade Runner -- a euphemism for detectives that hunt down and assassinate rogue replicants. He is forced back into active duty to track down a quartet of replicants who have escaped from an off-world colony and headed to Earth.
